title: wine_Scott_Paul_2007_La_Paulée_Pinot_Noir_(Willamette_Valley)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 44345.
country: US.
description: Four vineyards – Ribbon Ridge, Momtazi, Maresh and Shea – are included here. Soft and seductive, this wine caresses the palate with silky fruit. Aromatically it weaves together red fruits, truffles and clean, earthy scents. It reaches just over 13% alcohol; truly Burgundian yet with an Oregon flair to the fruit flavors. It puts the lie to any notion that this was a poor vintage. Challenging to be sure, but great wines were made in 2007, and this is one of them..
designation: La Paulée.
points: 93.
price: 30.0.
province: Oregon.
region_1: Willamette Valley.
region_2: Willamette Valley.
